TextView.android:text:
A Tic Tac Toe game that allows the user to create blogs. The player has to first get registered.

 The home page displays the no. of games played and won by the user. The game also allows user to add a profile picture.

 Local- The game can be played in offline mode as well- both single and double player.

 Blogs- Here the user can create and post personal blogs. The user can edit personal blog anytime.
 Also the likes on the blogs can be viewed here.

 Users- All registered users are visible here along with their contact details. There is also an option to tag the user by adding them as friend so that they do not have to search for their favourite player to play. To view more about a user tap on their icon, you can now view their blogs and react to them. Additionally, you can also send a Blog Collaboration Request. You will then be able to edit someone else's blog if they accept your Collaboration request.

 Friends- All your added friends are displayed here, send them a play request to play with them Tic Tac Toe online.

 Online Play- Tap on Play the Game to play Tic Tac Toe with your friend online.The game can be played with a user only after either you add them as friend or they. Tap on request play from the Friends Tab to play. The rules of the game are displayed on the i button on the top right.

 Tournament- This displays the profile of the user who has won most no. of Tic Tac Toe games.
 Contact us- In case you face any problem with playing the game mail us directly by tapping on this button.

 Thank you.
